localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Generate meta tags in one click for the best SEO of your website, rank high in search results, and appear unique when someone shares your link!
nodes.title: metaSEO - Generate meta tags in one click for the best SEO
nodes.author: Vishwa Gaurav

nodes.excerpt: Remmo is an app that turns your iPhone or iPad into a remote control for your computer. Whether you have a Macbook or an iMac, we've got you!
nodes.title: Remmo - Remote control of your Mac via iPhone
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Blobby is your cute buddy to help you develop healthy habits in the most important aspects of your life, with a strong focus on keeping balance. It uses the power of range-goals, lets you write a daily journal, and has a lot of great hairstyles for Blobby!
nodes.title: Blobby - The cutest habit tracker ever
nodes.author: Simon Rahm

nodes.excerpt: Are flight fares for your favorite destinations too high? ğŸ¤” No worries, weâ€™ll let you know when they go cheap ğŸ˜Š
nodes.title: Manyflights - Ridiculously low airfares straight to your inbox
nodes.author: Niki Kravchuk

nodes.excerpt: ReNett is a place for asynchronous group video messaging in communities. Think Reddit meets Snapchat. The new product includes a mobile app for video communication in communities ReNett and a video commentary plugin for websites ReCommentt.
nodes.title: ReNett - A convenient place for group video messaging in communities
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Citizens engagement platform that lets you create a landing page with an interactive map in just a few steps, launch a survey and collect citizens' ideas and votes - and make the right decisions for the city development.
nodes.title: Urbanpinion - Citizens engagement platform to develop your city together
nodes.author: Nadezhda Gerasimova

nodes.excerpt: Gelato Ops makes it easy to automate arbitrary smart contract functions on blockchains like Ethereum. Create and manage automated tasks that act like cron jobs within seconds. Our decentralized, highly reliable bot infrastructure does the rest for youğŸ¦ ğŸ¤–ï¸
nodes.title: Gelato Ops - Your multichain smart contract automation hub
nodes.author: Jun Gong

nodes.excerpt: Navi brings transcription and live translation to FaceTime through SharePlay. The app opens FaceTime up to people with hearing impairments and other disabilities that prevent them from engaging easily in a video call environment.
nodes.title: Navi - Transcription and live translation for FaceTime
nodes.author: Jordi Bruin

nodes.excerpt: 'Tis the time to express gratitude! So we are bringing Shout-Outs back! Highlight and celebrate makers and products that made 2021 incredible. Add your thanks and give recognition to those you appreciate.
nodes.title: 2021 Shout-Outs - Time to show love to your fav makers and products from 2021
nodes.author: Sharath Kuruganty

nodes.excerpt: It's a pack of custom 3D icons suitable for any crypto product. Create stunning, unique projects with these hand crafted icons, easily editable in Figma. 3D icons rock!
nodes.title: Crypto 3D Icons - 48 trendy customizable 3D icons for any crypto product

nodes.excerpt: Convert articles, summaries or newsletters into high quality audio readthroughs tailored for memory and helping you get what you need to know faster.
nodes.title: Article to Audio Conversion Kit - Turn your 'must do' reading into on the go listening

nodes.excerpt: A Figma design kit that emulates all of the utility props from NativeBase. Seamlessly integrate style guides, UI components, and pages into your web and mobile apps.
nodes.title: NativeBase v3 Figma Kit - Free Figma UI kit for building your next Web and Mobile App
nodes.author: Sanket Sahu

nodes.excerpt: Find tools and services faster for your eCommerce business. Reduce 100+ hours of research time, 200+ tools at your disposal. Designed to help entrepreneurs, eCommerce owners or anyone setting out to start their own business.
nodes.title: Scale To The Moon - Resource library made exclusively for e-commerce
nodes.author: Vivian L

nodes.excerpt: Learn to no-code by committing to the 100DaysOfNoCode challenge. It has 3 rules: 1. Publicly commit 2. Learn to no-code for at least 30 mins every day 3. Share your progress Get free daily lessons straight to your inbox. Commit now. Start Jan 1st, 2022 âš¡
nodes.title: 100DaysOfNoCode Challenge - Learn to no-code in 100 days
nodes.author: Sharath Kuruganty

nodes.title: My Year in Review - Reflect on your year 2021 in minutes

nodes.excerpt: A simple application that bootstraps your notion pages to a blog site. No more complicated setups, users can simply log in and add database id, that's it. Moreover, user can add their social links to increase their reach. Showcase: https://www.notiondiary.xyz/lakshya
nodes.title: Notion Diary - Bootstraps your notion pages to a blogsite

nodes.excerpt: See up to 4x more replies from LinkedIn outreach with video! Just install the Sendspark Chrome Extension to record and insert videos right from Sales Navigator and the LinkedIn message composer.
nodes.title: Sendspark for Linkedin - Drive more sales meetings with videos on Linkedin

nodes.excerpt: We leverage AI (with a human touch) to generate product ideas based on your interests, skills, and past projects.
nodes.title: Product Ideas On-Demand - Get ideas that match your interests, skills and projects

nodes.excerpt: I love generating ideas with GPT-3 and I had an idea to feed it with products created by the top (and my favorite) makers and then I told it to predict what their next projects will be. I thought the results were interesting!
nodes.title: Product Prediction - I asked GPT-3 to guess what the top makers will build next

nodes.excerpt: Flickcall is a privacy-focused browser extension to watch movies & TV shows together. Your personal chats & video stream are delivered directly to peers (without backend servers). Supports Netflix, Youtube, Primevideo, Hotstar, & Zee5.

nodes.excerpt: Otis House is a marketplace, auction platform, and vault for physical items, built on top of Ethereum. The physical items are stored, secured, and insured by Otis. We then mint an NFT for each item representing ownership of the asset.
